attributes.action: Make YouTube act when safeguarding issue arises, create policies and governance.
attributes.additional_details: Youtube to create policy and governance, meet and greets need to be dbs checked. They should not be allowed to message minors. Youtube needs a one strike you are out policy when it comes to our children,  action needs to happen. Safeguard and protect our children and minors. Do the right thing.
attributes.background: Youtube are not taking action to prevent children from bring exploited for views. They also ignore when some one has been s victim of a creator. Youtube is an incredible platform with no governance. A YouTuber is just the same as a children's presenter. They should be adhearing to the same laws.

rejection.details: You need to give your full name to start a petition.
